resources.string:
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" 
	package="uk.ac.swansea.dascalu.dvmicc.newsaggregator">


	<uses-permission 
		android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />


	<permission 
		android:name="uk.ac.swansea.dascalu.dvmicc.newsaggregator.permissions.READ_NEWS" 
		android:label="@string/readNewsPermissionLabel" 
		android:description="@string/readNewsPermissionDescription"/>


	<uses-permission 
		android:name="uk.ac.swansea.dascalu.dvmicc.newsaggregator.permissions.READ_NEWS"/>


	<application 
		android:allowBackup="true" 
		android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" 
		android:label="@string/app_name" 
		android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" 
		android:supportsRtl="true" 
		android:hardwareAccelerated="false" 
		android:theme="@style/AppTheme">


		<activity android:name=".LogInActivity"> 
			<intent-filter> 
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> 
			</intent-filter> 
		</activity>


		<activity android:name=".MainActivity"/> 
		<activity android:name=".SignUpActivity"/> 
		<activity android:name=".LoadingActivity"/> 
		<activity android:name=".FullArticleActivity"/> 

		<service android:name=".icc.NewsService" 
			android:exported="false" 
			android:enabled="true"/> 

		<receiver android:name=".icc.NewsBroadcastReceiver" 
			android:enabled="true"> 
			<intent-filter> 
				<action android:name="uk.ac.swansea.dascalu.dvmicc.newsaggregator.broadcast.NEWS_RESULT"/> 
			</intent-filter> 
		</receiver> 

	</application> 
</manifest>
